General.Name: Iljin Power Co. Ltd
General.Description: Iljin Power Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures nuclear and renewable energy equipment. It also engages in the routine maintenance of power plants. The company was formerly known as Iljin Energy Co., Ltd. Iljin Power Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
